title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 890.40 - Wastewater treatment requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 890.40 - Wastewater treatment requirements

State Regulations

It is the policy of the commission to give no credit
toward meeting wastewater treatment requirements for wastewater imported into
the Delaware River Basin. Wasteload allocations assigned to dischargers shall
not include loadings attributable to any importation of
wastewater. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
890.40

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
